2000.name: Unknown
2000.message:
Unable to connect to the Internet.

Although the connection to the wireless
router or network device was
successful, the connection to the
Internet failed.

Make sure your wireless router or
network device is correctly set up for
use and that other devices that use the
wireless network can connect online.

Unplug your modem and wireless router
or network device from the power outlet.
Wait a little while, plug them back in,
and try again.

Make sure the Wii U console is within
range of your wireless router and there
are no obstructions between them.

Move any electronics away from the
Wii U console and your wireless router.

If you are unable to access or change
the settings for your wireless router or
network device, please contact the
manufacturer for support.
2000.short_solution: Make sure your console is in range of your Wi-Fi network, and check the settings are correct. Make sure the 'Default' connection in Internet Settings is set correctly.
